name: FNDZ
description: The FNDZ token will be used for community governance on the FNDZ platform once it becomes a full-fledged DAO. Those who hold the governance token can participate in future decisions about the DeFi protocol. In addition, the FNDZ token has a number of other useful functions on the FNDZ platform. FNDZ consists of an ecosystem of traders interacting via the FNDZ Platform and the FNDZ Token. The goal of FNDZ is to create a transparent and decentralized environment where experienced traders can share their knowledge and build a following, while allowing small investors and beginners to easily enter the cryptocurrency markets. FNDZ's motto is "copy trading made easy" and has a desire to become the world's best DeFi copy trading platform that enables copy/social trading from a truly decentralized perspective. Through the FNDZ platform, you will be able to copy your favorite and or best-performing traders without having to constantly monitor the markets. Moreover, on FNDZ, you physically own your assets, as they are securely stored in a wallet of your choice.
